kickstart.post:
/sbin/chkconfig rabbitmq-server on /usr/lib/rabbitmq/bin/rabbitmq-plugins enable rabbitmq_management
# start the server and set up user credential /sbin/service rabbitmq-server start admin_pass=$(< /dev/urandom tr -dc _A-Z-a-z-0-9 | head -c26) /usr/sbin/rabbitmqctl add_user rocks ${admin_pass} /usr/sbin/rabbitmqctl set_user_tags rocks administrator /usr/sbin/rabbitmqctl set_permissions -p / rocks ".*" ".*" ".*" echo ${admin_pass} > /opt/rocks/etc/rabbitmq.conf chmod 400 /opt/rocks/etc/rabbitmq.conf
